u.a: maı [*] wɒnt tə drɔ: ənʌðə wʌn
a wɒnt tu du ənʌðə wʌn
u: ɡəʊ tə naıt ku:l [*] tədeı
mʌmi wəʊn ɡəʊ tə naıt ku:l [*]
ðıs ız ə ðʊɡ ðʊɡ [*] bəʊt
voiceless lateral alveolar affricate replaced by voiced dental fricative;
voiceless lateral fricative replaced by voieless dental fricative; voiced alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative;
aı kæn pʊt ıt ɒn maın
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "your"; voiceless lateral fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative in "shoe";
a hæv ə ɵu: [*] ın ə mınıt
voiceless lateral fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative in "shoe";
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "you"; copula omitted;
aı dıdn̩ si:t [*] ðæt tə [*] lɒŋ taım
short vowel lengthened in "sit"; to = for;
li:nə wıl kʌm ðıs saıd nɛks

g.ga: I prefer to have jam tart

u.a: voiced alveolar plosive devoiced in "should have"; should have = prefer; voiced lateral alveolar fricative replaced by voiced alveolar plosive in "jam";
doesn't = don't; first and third elements of cluster deleted in "pastry";
a dʌzn [*] wɒnt ə pu:n [*] tə beık [*] ıt ɔl ʌp .
doesn't = don't; first element of cluster deleted in "spoon"; second element of cluster deleted in "break";
voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative in "same"; voiced lateral alveolar affricate replaced by voiced alveolar plosive in "jam";
alveolar continuant replaced by close round back vowel;
children's = children are; already = now; alveolar continuant deleted in "already";
voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative in "pussy's"; to = for;
doesn't = don't; voiced alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative in "those";
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "you"; isn't = aren't;
we = we are; first element of cluster deleted in "school";
ɔ:l ə bɔız ə [*] ɡɒn ınsaıd
ɑ:nti dæk [*] wıl brıŋ maı [*] həʊm
voiced lateral alveolar affricate replaced by voiced alveolar plosive in "Jack"; my = me;
ɡəʊ du: ıt ɒn də [*] lævəti [*] kɒs aız [*] ə bıɡ ɡə:l .
voiced dental fricative replaced by voiced alveolar plosive in "the": second element of cluster deleted in "lavatory"; I's = I'm;
pɔ dædi ni:dz ðʌmðıŋ [*] mɔ tu i:t
voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative;
voiced lateral alveolar continuant replaced by close round back vowel;
voiced lateral alveolar affricate replaced by voiced alveolar plosive;
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "you"; tomorrow = today;
mʌmi [*] ɡıtıŋ sʌm frɒm ə ɔ:də
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "you"; isn't = aren't;
second element of voiceless lateral alveolar affricate becomes voiceless dental fricative;
first element of cluster deleted in "story"; second element of 3-element cluster deleted in "upstairs";
aı wɒn tə æv ə laı ɒn ə kɑʊtɵ [*]
second element of voiceless lateral alveolar affricate becomes voiceless dental fricative;
ðıs ənz [*] ɡɒt ə həʊl laık ðıs
aı wəunt ɡəʊ tə bɛd naʊ
aı [*] lʊkıŋ ɑ:ftə pɔ: lıtʊ [*] tɛdi
I = I'm; voiced lateral alveolar continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel;
voiced lateral approximant replaced by voiced dental fricative;
i: wɒnt [*] tə pleı wıð ıt
dædi wɒnts sʌm mo: brɛd tə ɡəʊ tə wə:k təmɒrəʊ [*]

g.ga: Mummy's too big to go in Lulu's high chair

u.a: mʌmız ə bıɡ ɡə:l tə ɡəʊ ın luluz haı tʃɛə
wi dıdn̩ hæv sʌm taım tə lɒŋ taım
"to" still being used for "for" , but exact meaning unclear
dædi sɛd maı [*] kʊd teık ə lıtʊ bıt lɒŋɡə .
kən aı teık ma əʊn peıpə ɒf
voiced lateral alveolar approximant deleted in "you"; you = your; to = with (or for);
ıts ɔ [*] də:t [*] ın hıə naʊ
final consonant deleted in "all"; final syllable deleted in "dirty";
ə teıbʊklɒð [*] əð [*] nıəli kʌmd [*] ɒf
voiced lateral alveolar continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel in "tablecloth"; voiced alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative in "has"; comed = come;
aı dıdən du ıt ɒn pə:pəɵ [*]
voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative;
voiced lateral approximant deleted in "you"; first element of cluster deleted in "scribble";
voiced alveolar lateral continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel;
aı [*] kʌmın nau tə ɵʌmp [*] wıð maı ɵu:z [*]
I = I'm; voiced lateral alveolar affricate replaced by voiceless dental fricative in "jump"; voiceless lateral fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative in "shoes";
in response to Lucy saying ɢThat's not skippingɦ
voiced alveolar lateral continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel in "will"; second element of cluster deleted in "draw";
u [*] ɡıv ðæt wʌn tə mi
voiced alveolar fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative;
aı dıd si: wʌn ɒn maı hɒlıdeız
wi wıʊ [*] hæv ðu:z [*] ɒn tə ɡəʊ sʌndeı ku:l [*]

voiced lateral alveolar continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel in "will"; voiceless lateral fricative replaced by voiced dental fricative in "shoes"; first element of cluster deleted in "school";
aı dıd si: maʊsi ɒm maı hɒlıdeı
playing a game of going to London
first element of medial cluster deleted; final voiceless alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless dental fricative;
kæn aı pʊt ði:z ɒn ə teıbʊ [*] nɑʊ
voiced alveolar lateral continuant replaced by rounded close back vowel;
